website_summaries.verdict: An automatic setup model with the poles pre-attached to the tent.
pros: A good price for an automatic pop-up tent
Fits a queen mattress with extra space for gear
Lives up to its promise of easy assembly and disassembly
cons: The hexagonal design makes it harder to fit taller people

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Two Adults
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I were looking for a new tent to take camping at renfest. This tent was perfect. It fits a queen mattress with enough room on the sides for a duffel bag or backpack. The porch is cute feature and we love the convenience of the pop up design. I do recommend setting up and taking the tent down a couple times before heading heading out. It can be a little confusing at first. Overall, looking forward to several fun tent adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up, spacious, weather-resistant
customer_reviews.text: I picked this tent up about two weeks ago, went for camping last weekend and I couldn't be more happy. It maintained temperature without a problem. It rained all night on Saturday and we encountered wind as well which was blowing around 30 mph and this tent sustained it, I had no issues at all. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who are a good camping lovers and looking for a proper tent. Also, the tent had a huge amount of room, could easily fit about 4 in it. Definitely recommendable !!
customer_reviews.author: Ozarka

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up but be a tad extra careful when you break camp.
customer_reviews.text: Very much enjoyed this tent- took camping with 3 adults and had room for our middle sized dog to sleep inside tent with us. Nice to be almost able to stand upright instead of being hunched and squeezed in all together. Easy to set up but be a tad extra careful when you break camp. The locking elements can be hard to close down. Take the time -Work the shutdown Connections a bit by themselves to make things easier to shut back down. I see us using this for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Not the tent for me!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this tent in November of 2018 and we camped in it one time and it was a great experience. But, this tent cannot withstand winds of 20 or so mph. I live in Louisiana where the weather changes every 30 minutes. A freak storm blew through and it just folded like a taco. Ripped along the seam by the door witch I taped but the poles themselves also broke. So it's pretty much junk. It stands crooked and wont become taunt now. And from what I can see there's no manufacturers warranty, just a return date. Purchaser beware.
customer_reviews.author: Corey broussard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This "tent" went up easy and is of quality materials. I have not had to weigh it down with bricks, sand or stones, and the "hexagon" structure is the optimal shape for keeping it stable and grounded. The double front zipper doors are a good feature and the attachable rain cover roof if a must. One thing I wish it did not have is the breathe mesh all the way around, as I am using this outside in the winter. But, the "breathe" mesh is important to those camping in spring or summer. The zippers, fasteners, elastic pulls and all accompaniments are of good quality too. This "tent" is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be a little more clear. But it went up easily. We had strong winds after setup and the tent stakes pulled up out of the ground. Bought eight new and better stakes and set it up again. Didnt have the same problem afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap tent!
customer_reviews.text: The material looks a bit cheap but then again this is a cheap tent. It was easy to set up and is very roomie. Can’t wait to go camping next weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Zabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great value for the money. Super easy to set up and take down. It provided good shelter for two adults 5’11” and 6’0”). It didn’t have condensation issues. It was tall so we didn’t feel cramped. I don’t know about sleeping two adults and a child—maybe if all are petit. I’m very happy with this purchase. I think it would meet the needs of a beginning to intermediate camper well. For a serious backpacker brobably a bit big/bulky/heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue/gray colored tent. Received green. The description said it could accommodate a queen size air mattress with room to fit 3-4 people and have extra available room on the floor for things like duffel bags. This was far from the truth. When zipped closed, my tent had a muffin top. There was no room for anything on the floor. See photos for proof. It also comes with cheaply made stakes that bend when put in the ground. I was frustrated with this. Although it pops up nicely, it's a pain in the neck and quite difficult to take down with arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda (Alaska)

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tent
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tent. Easiest tent I've ever set up. Takes one person and less than a minute. There was some condensation or dew that ended up on the inside of the tent. Everything stayed dry unless you rubbed against the wall. Wish the zippers were a little bigger, I had issues with them wanting to snag on the material. Other than that no complaints...I'll get a lot of use out of this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 3-4 people with room for gear
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tent for winter camping where you actually spend some time hanging out in the tent. It's big enough that you can fit comfortably with your sleeping pads, bags, and gear, but not too big that it gets too cold or you have a bunch of wasted space. The net at the top held our large LED light perfectly so we were able to play cards after the sunset with plenty of light. Setting up the tent is pretty basic, just snap together the poles and slip it through the loops. Zippers were ok quality. I don't see them breaking anytime soon. The fabric is nice quality without making the tent too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $90 on this, pole snapped on initial setup
customer_reviews.text: #1 instructions are lacking in detail #2 pole snapped during initial assembly #3 product said it was delivered a month before it was actually delivered (Amazon glitch?) #4 putting up and taking down was far more of a chore than it should have been. I was looking for easy assembly/take down due to wrist surgery but due to the pole snapping and overall difficulty with this product, I'll purchase a different tent that will better fit what I need. This one is just too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: C-Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to travel with on airplanes. Its not too heavy and the bag is small enough to not have to struggle with it in the airport. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Berger

customer_reviews.title: Practically instant setup
customer_reviews.text: I use this for car camping with my kiddo. It's just barely large enough to fit a full size air mattress plus a couple duffel bags. Sets up in under a minute, and packs up in under 5. Compared to a traditional pole tent, it's freakishly easy. The Coleman instant up tents are a lot larger, but less sturdy IMO, and a lot more hassle. Love this little tent for 2-person camping when the weather's good and you are only using the tent for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I can put it up and take it down in about 3 mins by myself and I’m only 5’3”. It stores compactly and fits pretty much anywhere after it’s been put back in its bag. My favorite part is having a door on each side. Very nice feature if I want to keep both doors open but stay in shade to read a book. Keeps the airflow going nicely.
customer_reviews.author: BCherieJ

customer_reviews.title: Large tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a large tent. It is easy to put up and take down. The only downside is that it is pretty large (3ft) in length, which makes packing more challenging, especially on a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Spinazzola

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this tent is excellent. It goes up so quick. It comes with a storage bag, convenient to take it during travels. Most important, it takes only seconds to automatically pop up and down on a flat ground. Light weight, waterproof well and good enough for 3-4 people. Also, it has 2 layers and the outer layer can be separated to use alone as a flysheet. Cannot wait to use it on my family's next camping trip. It's also good to bring to the beach as an alternative to bringing a giant umbrella. Highly recommend this tent! Totally love it!
customer_reviews.author: JRRinBoston

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The tent material is not water resistant or proof. The first time I used it, it rained and anything sitting against the side got damp. The third time I used it, it down poured and I found standing water IN the tent, and nothing was touching the sides. It's disappointing because this concept is perfect for the trips I go on. I tried treating the tent with a water proof spray, and it almost melted the tent material. I would not recommend this tent unless you are going to be in a dry climate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Assemble but Super Small Inside
customer_reviews.text: This tent was super easy to assemble. My husband had it up and staked in less then 2 minutes. We loved that part of it. However, we ended up returning this tent because it was incredibly small. There is NO WAY it would sleep 4 people. It wouldn't even fit our standard queen air mattress and we ended up having to sleep on the ground. Hardly room for 2 in tent and all we brought was 1 backpack each.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely easy to up/take down but it felt small to me
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely easy to put up and take down. However, the octagon shape of it made it feel smaller than the average rectangular four person tent.
customer_reviews.author: DKT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tent!!! It does leak a bit around where the tarp meets the waterproof mesh, along the seam
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, quick set up
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for a 2-day camping trip in Central California. Pros: quick set up, 1 person set up, small size( when packed up) fits well in my Yaris, 2 entrance/exits, hook for hanging keys(hangs from ceilng) and pocket for small item storage. Cons: in the smaller side, not suitable for taller people, it would fit 2 adults or 2 adults and a smaller child, 3 adults would be a tight fit. Well the cons did not impact our stay or use of the tent (I am short and was with my 11 year old daughter) I thought it would be good info to point out.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another one in the future!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the setup!!! Great privacy when inside and reflects heat great. Nicely put together and only bad comment was breaking down the tent was a little tricky. Watch a YouTube video first to learn how to break down and you will have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: T. O.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up - I can do it all by myself no trouble and I’m 5 feet tall. Very lightweight but not for backpacking - it doesn’t fold up small enough for that. I have used it in light rain/dew with no leaking. It looks cool too lol I got the tan color. It’s y’all enough and wide enough for comfort for my much taller hubby. Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is the material is very thin. I don’t have tears yet but I’m very careful Because I think it could tear somewhat easily from a sharp rock or something.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA

customer_reviews.title: Not as it seems but not bad either....
customer_reviews.text: The tent is actually a lot smaller than it is made to look. The listed dimensions are accurate but this is not a 3 to 4 person tent. It affords ample room for one person and some gear. Any more than that then it gets crowded. I’ve set it up and taken it sown several times, it is not as straight forward as the video shows, however, it is faster than the quickest dome tent set up. This is not a backpacking tent, it will not fit into a motorcycle saddlebag either and is to long to tie it onto a pannier lid.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: Great for car camping
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I went camping without borrowing equipment from others. I set up my own gear so the pop up was great. Everyone was impressed with the ease and quickness in the time I set up. It is pretty str8 forward. The only downside is the compacted version is a tad bulky so I would definitely not use this for backpacking. It'll be great for music festivals when they're allowed again! Very happy with my purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Akau

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The main feature of this tent is simplicity of assembling. It is easy as 1 2 3 . I've tested the tent under 4 hours rain and the interior remained dry. This tent is perfect fit for 2 adult sleeping bags with extra space on each side. For backpacking I would say it should fit in 80L backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rus Z

customer_reviews.title: Paid full price and got damaged product.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the tent yesterday night. I unpacked the box today and set it up in my living room. I am really bumped about it when I saw the scuff marks on the tent fabric on one side. It should have been properly inspected before shipping it to me. Please correct the issue as soon as possible since my family campout is in couple of weeks. I will update my review once the issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Check everything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a new product, what I received was a used broken tent. I was shocked that it wasnt even checked, where was quality control. When we went to set it up, inside was dirt, empty water bottle, sock, gum. It was obviously used, then one of the main poles was broken. Extremely disappointed, what if we hadn't checked it before vacation and we were stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Corwith

customer_reviews.title: Moisture Free Durable in any weather kinda tent
customer_reviews.text: We used tent for camping at Big Bear Lake. Weather was really cold 30 degrees, the tent dis not have any moisture or anything going on. It was the best tent We invested in. I strongly recommend this tent to avid campers. Its super easy to set up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2camp69

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely a good tent to have
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a good tent to have. The size is just right for us. My daughter was simply excited and couldn't wait till a real camping in the woods. So we decided to have a picnic in the backyard with the tent. The instructions are simple and clear, so it didn't take us too much time to set it up. And it was easy to tumble it down, too. Besides, it IS waterproof. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Assembly defects and lack of instructions
customer_reviews.text: Judging from the product pictures & description this seemed like a good product. I used this for the first time this past weekend. The first surprise was how hard it turned out to be the assembly process; the "easy" part was not that easy and it took a considerable amount of force to open the umbrella mechanism to set up the tent. Second surprise was to fin one of the loops where the rain cover attaches being fixed in the wrong place, at the top of the tent instead of the middle of the first section of the poles. It rained lightly during the first night and the tent kept dry; I haven't tested this tent under heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Coto Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tent about a year ago for motorcycle camping trips, works great! I recently had a pole attachment point break. I reached out for advice on how to replace/purchase a replacement pole assembly and received feedback within an hour. Communication back and forth was great, and ended up having the tent replaced under warranty. Received the replacement tent in less than a week! Very happy with how everything was handled, could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Enjoyed the time we spent using it and it even kept us dry in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Elana Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Had this tent for a few years now, pretty impressed for the money I spent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent has held up just as good as any budget tent I've ever owned. Love the convenience of the pop up design. Never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Having never set up a tent before, I pulled this one from the bag wondering to myself how on earth I would figure it out. To my surprise, it pretty much set itself up. I just had to make a couple adjustments and push down on the top until it clicked (as the directions clearly state) and stick the stakes in the ground and it was good to go! Take down was just as easy, I had it packed up and easily fit it back in the bag while most of my friends were still breaking their tents down.
customer_reviews.author: Jeela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Went up and back down very easily, and perfect for two adults.
customer_reviews.author: TJoy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth getting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the second time and unfortunately the tent had to be completely dismantled and put back together again! This had to be done because one of the hooks broke off. Due to this something that only took a few minutes to put together this time around took over an hr!!! Not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you get more then you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this tent yet as we are heading into winter and I bought it to use next spring, but they want you to review things right after you buy them. So with that in mind, this tent is very light, I bought some heavy tent stakes based on the reviews I read, the waterproof and strength rating is much better than tents costing much more so I am confident that this tent will work well for my wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stephen Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Easy BUT
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to take up and put away. Unfortunately, the seams are not seals and one side of the tent was soaked after a moderate 40 rainfall. It has been exactly 30 days since my order was placed and there is no option to return. Hmmmm. NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This tent really takes a minute or less to set up. BUT it's not quite 8 feet in diameter, which won't fit an air mattress. When all set up, there is no way this would fit 4 adults. We returned it with no problem, but neither did the company offer a solution or suggest another tent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for a summer tent.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for Summer camping. Nice and spacious. Fall camping needs some extra care for you reduce heat loss. We are going to get a moving blanket to cover the bug netting on top. Would make a lot better for cool weather camping.
customer_reviews.author: John Comer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zipper
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use until it was to late to return. The zipper broke on the first zip. Maybe it was faulty but now I'm stuck with it. Be sure to look at your stuff rigjt away. It's a shame be ause it went up quick and seemed it seemed like it was going to be a great tent.
customer_reviews.author: Kim A.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for summer camping, runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I knew the dimensions and whatnot prior to buying so it's not so much a complaint as it is an observation. I don't really see how this could comfortably fit four people. Definitely two people no problem, but you may want to get a larger tent for any more. Super easy to setup and extremely breathable (excellent for summer weather). I wouldn't recommend this tent for colder conditions, as the interior is entirely mesh, so it would likely be very cold, but for summer, this tent is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: seandog

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, very well made
customer_reviews.text: We have used the tent for several camping trips and it's excellent. A breeze to set up, very well made and plenty of room for the 2 of us and gear. I'm 5'8" and I can stand up in it, which was one of our criteria. Had one day of heavy rain and sleet and the tent was bone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This tent's setup was so easy. It really can be popped open in a minute. I worried about the quality of the tent but it was put to the test in a heavy storm with winds around 60mph. Surprisingly, it didn't leak, fold over, or fly off. Cons: I found little strings coming out all through the interior. I'm not sure what they are. Though putting up the tent is easy, putting it away will take some practice. Getting the strap that holds the tent "burrito" together to close is a struggle. I wish it was a little longer so that I could tighten it after securing it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This is hands down the best tent I have ever
customer_reviews.text: I use this tent for the first time this past weekend. It was a breeze to put up and take down. I had zero issues with condensation and we were camping in below 30 degree weather. The two gear pockets and overhead gear storage came in handy too.you don't need a tarp to cover the bottom or hassle with a rain fly it 100 percent waterproof all the way around. This is hands down the best tent I have ever !
customer_reviews.author: Ming lee

customer_reviews.title: Worse like a charm and bone dry.
customer_reviews.text: First trip rained non stop all weekend. Not a drop of water in. I suggesting practicing taking down and up a few times as it is easy but if you are like me forgot and took twice a long to get down. All user error. This is a great easy tent.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar vabch

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchase of this tent. I was able to set it up by myself, except for the rain fly,in about 10 minutes. i was able to fit my full size air mattress plus all my gear, which includes large dog items. It says it can sleep 4 adults, but I think this would be without any large amount of gear. It was comfortable and my dog and I stayed dry in the overnight rain. Overall, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Marchand

customer_reviews.title: Very good tent
customer_reviews.text: Very good and easy to setup even in the dark in the rain... I stayed dry and no issues at all. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chad chorak

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble in less than 3 minutes by myself. The first time I used it there was a light rain and it held up and stayed perfectly dry. The quality seems to be really good, it is roomy inside, and having 2 doors makes a HUGE difference when it comes to air flow and ventilation. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Pitching this tent is a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been tent camping for 30+yrs and rain and tents don’t mix. There are some things you can do to minimize the water leakage but getting wet is inevitable when tent camping.IMHO. Pack a tarp for extra protection. With that said $ was great this is an excellent budget tent! Assembled gets a 5. My 12yr old twin daughters had this up in less than 5min without adult assistance:) For weight it gets a 3, camping is good but I wouldn’t take it backpacking. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McSherry

customer_reviews.title: Easy up
customer_reviews.text: Put this up once and it took a while to figure it out as the directions left out a couple of things. The best thing is the openings on opposite sides so you can get a good breeze. Easy to take down and put back into the bag. It will be hauled on a motorcycle and is a good size for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Darrow

customer_reviews.title: First time easy up tent
customer_reviews.text: So easy and lite to use! However, for colder mountain air its not very insulated. And the zippers don't seem durable. But for the money it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Severson

customer_reviews.title: Door screen damaged on arrival and shotty sewing of seams
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes. The set up / take down was easy however the screen door was damaged perhaps from packaging which resulted in stress areas on the screen in 8-10 areas and many tent seams had threads hanging from them that pulled apart when pulled.
customer_reviews.author: moose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up, easy to take down. I would say after you've done it once or twice, both processes take less than 10 minutes. Woke up in the morning to wet grass, which the reinforced tent bottom had repelled perfectly. Fit two adults + gear comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Maiani

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the bum to disassemble
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this tent... the 3 times I used it before it broke while disassembling it( top got stuck and a rod broke while closing it) Unfortunately I can’t order a replacement part. I have to buy a new tent now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how you would fit 3 people unless they are kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for doing a tent inside a tent. my 10x20 is really cold at night, so I bought this tent to set up inside and put my queen airbed in it. I got the queen fully inflated inside, but it was pushing out the sides of the tent. I gave it 3 stars cause I thought it was actually made good, I really wish it would have served my needs.
customer_reviews.author: K311y02l4

customer_reviews.title: Door Design can be improved
customer_reviews.text: Door zipper broke on the first day. How the opens make it a bit difficult to go in and out without opening all the way, which is not good in bug season. It stayed dry in all day rain. It is a good tent over all, though.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good tent
customer_reviews.text: We put it up once in the living room just to teach my son how to do it, but we noticed the little piece of rain cloth that covers the folding mechanism wasn't in our bag. Is it hidden away somewhere in a secret place and we didn't see it or did we perhaps not actually receive it?
customer_reviews.author: P. Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk no way 3 grown people can sleep in this so called 3 to 4 person tent total waste of money I went to Walmart and bought a tent almost twice the size do $30 cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Christopher woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The tent is amazing. Spacious for 3-4 people, and if you’re tall like I am, it’s nice because I can stand up in it and be fine. The only problem is that bag that holds the tent. The minute I opened it the zipper broke and there is a small hole in the bag itself. Other than that it’s a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really does pop up very quickly and easy! Tried to fit an air mattress inside and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really does pop up very quickly and easy! Tried to fit an air mattress inside and was unable to maybe a twin in would work but other than that I would recommend sleeping bags and it's not that tall. Totally worth it and it is so easy to use and space efficient!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Weak zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent last August and the zipper is already broken. It’s come of the track and the seam is torn. It’s only been on two weeklong camping trips. I would not purchase this tent again.
customer_reviews.author: Deni

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used in the rain yet but this was such an easy setup. Takedown wasnt bad for me and easily fit back into the bag
customer_reviews.author: Daniel_J

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: If you can’t assemble this don’t bother going camping. It’s that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph LaFreniere

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tent but the directions should include how to release to take down. Love your return policy. This has not discouraged me to continue looking for a tent.
customer_reviews.author: ljoyce

customer_reviews.title: Cool tent but if you're six foot or taller
customer_reviews.text: Cool tent but if you're six foot or taller, get something larger. I have to sleep in this diagonally which is awkward. The dimensions listed are NOT the interior dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: LIghtweight and erects/dismantles easily and quickly once you learn the tricks of the trade!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions and illustrations for erecting tent not as clear as they could be. One must be very careful zipping or unzipping the doors and screens,go slow as zippers pulls tend to catch on edges of other parts more than ideal.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Garbage-
customer_reviews.text: Trash, and could be dangerous if someone was counting on it during a long hike. I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. With all of the shutdowns, she didn't get to use it until June. When she tried to set it up the first time, it had some damaged and missing pieces, and had to be propped up. she threw it away, rather than carrying it for the rest of her trip. Yes, she should have tried it out before her trip. But it should be a much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: michael cox

customer_reviews.title: Like the ease of setting up
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the ease of setting up but the rain fly is questionable if it starts pouring rain. Also the instructions were not clearly stated. But is easy enough to figure it out. Overall, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to put up and a little bit harder to take down. Haven’t had it in the rain yet. With that being said, if that checks out I’ll give it a five!!
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN SHAW

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I’m 5’6” and not able to fully stand but only had to slouch a bit to change. My cot barely fit and was able to fit my cot and a tote in tent. It worked for what I needed. The zipper never caught on anything and the tent is durable
customer_reviews.author: Babs0420

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up well in the wind
customer_reviews.text: On the second use, the wind was strong, 10-15 mph and broke one of the legs at the joint. I can't seem to find a way to order parts. Also, because of the design, dirt/dust was easily blown into the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent was lit on my week of camping. Some water got through a little bit with speck holes but thats normal. Great buy and donated after I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice tent.
customer_reviews.text: Well, first it takes longer than 4 seconds to set up( as it said in the ad.) It takes two people. That said, it’s a nice tent and easy to set up. I’m taking off a star because it isn’t an “instant” tent.
customer_reviews.author: linda stroope

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent twice; it’s very easy to set up. The stakes take the longest. I can stand up in it not all the way I’m 6’ 1” but enough to get my pants on.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Great tent! Tho 3 season tent should be draft free
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! Biggest drawback is the rain fly doesn’t go down to the ground! For a three season tent, The fly not extending to the ground allows the wind to drive up under and into the tent
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gregory Adlon

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice tent for a child
customer_reviews.text: Product not as described ! This is a very small tent; definitely not a 3 person tent ! My son is 5'9" and is unable to fit side to side in this tent ! He sleeps diagonally in it with little room for any supplies ! This is a very nice tent for a child ! It should be listed as such !
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, I’m 6’ 2” and this tent was just way to small for me. I thought that when it said 3-4 people that it would be big enough but it wasn’t even close! It is easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: tpseagle

customer_reviews.title: Easy up
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, simple design my 9 year old can pop up on his own although he needs help popping it down since it is a little too tall for him to lift up the release. Added weatherizer when I got it out of the box and no issues at all with the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing gear loft netting, but great tent so far.
customer_reviews.text: I may modify this soon... but so far so good except my tent seems to be missing the gear loft mesh thing. I have torn everything apart looking for it and it isnt here. Beside that... super easy to put up and lots of room. Got a queen size air mattress inside right now but plan on upgrading to a king soon. Just wish i had that gear loft mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Easy Sturdy Tent
customer_reviews.text: Easiest tent setup EVER!!! Quality tent and spacious, can fit two people but I rather have this to my self. Very roomy! Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: NurseBetty1960

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the easiest assembly and disassembly tent that I know. Bomm it's up! Boom it's down.
customer_reviews.author: C I M

customer_reviews.title: So Easy, great tent!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up and take down. Loved it! It’s so easy we thought there had to be something more to putting it up. Just be careful not to force any of the joints. When done correctly they are easy to take apart. Force it, u might break it.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Spur

customer_reviews.title: decent tent for price
customer_reviews.text: the material is thin, I imagine it will last for a while. hard to erect in the wind. not good for burning man! lets lots of dust in. Not as easy to pop up as advertised. all in all, its a decent tent.
customer_reviews.author: theodore

customer_reviews.title: Good tent needs more rain cover though
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a better rain cover ( we threw and extra tarp over it when it poured didn'tget wet after that) Other than that easy set up even in the dark. Bought it about a year ago and no problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Easy up...not-so-easy taking down!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is so easy to set up, it’s amazing! Getting it folded back and into its bag though...not so easy, and the directions are confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Decent tent for price EZ set up , plenty room
customer_reviews.text: Tent was swell except the huge open mesh top under the rain fly lets alot of air in, recommend not using tent when it's really cold out
customer_reviews.author: brian jensen

customer_reviews.title: This tent is very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This tent is very easy to set up. It's perfect for kids (scouts or camping in the backyard). They can put it up on their own and it only takes about 5 minutes. It will hold three kids or three small adults comfortably - otherwise, probably 2 people max, but they would have plenty of room. It's also pretty easy to get back into the carrying case and is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Excellent easy set up tent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent 3 person tent here! So easy to set up. Literally takes less than 1 minute to set up and you’re ready to stake it down. Watch the set up video! Recommend for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dale Beard

customer_reviews.title: Supper easy to assembled and take down
customer_reviews.text: Surper easy to put up and take down. Awesome for the kids they can do it on there own. We love it. We stay dry when it rains. If you tent camp its for you. The windows give awesome ventilation when its hot out.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tent. First time buying and sleeping in one. I am in it right now on rain and it’s totally water proof. Like the canopy that can be propped up to cover entrance so even with light rain I’ve been able to enjoy the view. Fits queen size air mattress perfectly if you first put it in half full and then finish up blowing once in tent.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Just used this tent for the first time 2 weeks ago. It rained for 14 hours non-stop; saturating the ground around the tent. Tent stayed amazingly dry. A little small for two people with inflatable beds. Easy to put up. Fabric intended to secure guy wires all ripped off the tent. Had to use the tent poles to secure ropes. Overall a pretty good buy and particularly impressed with rain worthiness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this tent to others
customer_reviews.text: Requires no set up, pops up in less than 1 minute. I am a 5'2 female, 105 pounds and I can open and close the tent myself without any trouble. I would recommend this tent to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dordorchan

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better tent.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is easy to set up. That's all it has going for it. IT IS NOT water resistant at all. The tent isn't sturdy in the wind and the doors arent designed well. This is not a quality tent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, not as well built as a Coleman, but very fast to get up and down
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small, I think it fits 2 people comfortably. Zipper for one of the doors broke, thankfully there are two doors, one on each side. The bottom is not sealed or tarped, so you'll want to have one in case it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Akhenatonio

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof before use
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. You'll need to waterproof the material yourself. Mine did not include the rainfly for some reason. Not exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight durable 60 second setup 5 minute teardown
customer_reviews.text: Good quality Tiffany warm and dry I'll need you to live in it highly recommend avoided me getting arrested due to easy setup and especially teardown. police saw that it was down and packed ready to go within 10 12 minutes has to be no further last Summer. Up and out without getting cuffed huge bonus
customer_reviews.author: Otis FireFly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up, easy to take down. Nice heavy duty material. Overall very happy with my new tent
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

product_meta.title: Toogh 3-4 Person Camping Tent Backpacking Tents Hexagon Waterproof Dome Automatic Pop-Up Outdoor Sports Tent Camping Sun Shelters Provide Top Rainfly, Advanced Venting Design

✅【100% Risk Free Pirchase】: Are you unsatisfied with the our tent? we offer 24-hour customer service and a 12-month satisfaction guarantee for a completely risk-free purchase. If there are any problems with the tent, please e-mail us. So do not hold back any longer
